Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Kn2(S10R) (BmKn2 analog, synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Luo X, Ye X, Ding L, Zhu W, Yi P, Zhao Z, Gao H, Shu Z, Li S, Sang M, Wang J, Zhong W, Chen Z. 2021
Literature.Title: Fine-Tuning of Alkaline Residues on the Hydrophilic Face Provides a Non-toxic Cationic alpha-Helical Antimicrobial Peptide Against Antibiotic-Resistant ESKAPE Pathogens.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toparent peptide BmKn2I: 23%, L=F=A=R: 15%.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 29212 (MIC 10 ug/ml) and E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 20 ug/ml).In vitro toxicity: HC50 = 25 ug/ml, hemolytic.
